content: **cozy up in the you are valued crochet cocoon cardigan a hug in yarn form** welcome to the world of comfortable stylish crochet with the you are valued crochet cocoon cardigan pattern by marly bird this pattern is perfect for crochet enthusiasts of all levels from those just starting their crochet garment journey to seasoned crafters looking for a satisfyingly simple project vibrant versatility this cardigan pattern celebrates size inclusivity spanning from s to 5xl to ensure that every crafter can create a cocoon cardigan that feels like a warm embrace designed to be oversized for that luxurious snuggly feel this piece invites you to wrap yourself in comfort and color ✂️ seamless crafting joy embrace the joy of crafting with minimal seaming involved with detailed instructions and the join-as-you-go technique this pattern ensures that your crochet experience is as smooth as the yarn gliding through your fingers dazzling yarn simple stitches featuring sridar s jewelspun yarn 1 known for its enchanting self-striping kaleidoscope of colors this pattern brings the magical look of handspun fiber to your wardrobe the comprehensive schematic alongside clear written instructions and supportive video tutorials guides you through each step ensuring your crafting experience is as enjoyable as wearing the final product what s included size-inclusive pattern for xs to 5xl a versatile pattern that suits various skill levels customizable length instructions for the cuff and collar easy-to-follow stitch pattern that highlights the beauty of the yarn schematics and video tutorials for added support learn more about the cardigan here ** https //marlybird com/blog/you-are-valued-crochet-cocoon-cardigan-free-pattern/ 2 ** 1 https //shrsl com/4gft3 2 https //marlybird com/blog/you-are-valued-crochet-cocoon-cardigan-free-pattern/
